message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase my product. Given its value and potential, I'm asking for $12,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to what I'm willing to pay. How about $9,500?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm confident in the value of my product. How about we meet halfway at $10,750?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering the value I place on this product, how about we settle at $10,250?
